channel.title: KrisMa
channel.description: He destroyed my mushroom house and then place a woodenplank, there was a plake written "Leosobral's house dont grief !! An then he destroyed. Its very difficult to build mushrooms house. He destroy my bed too and didnt gave me back.

item.title: KrisMa
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I’d love to come fix this for you, but I don’t have access to in-game commands at the moment, but I can try and get another staff member to fix it for you.

I’ll have a word with KrisMa when I next see him.

Moving this ( he was warned) so if staff see anymore reports or grief from him a harsher punishment might be needed.

Read full topic

item.title: KrisMa
item.dc:creator: @Leosobral Leosobral
item.description:
@Leosobral wrote:

He destroyed my mushroom house and then place a woodenplank, there was a plake written "Leosobral’s house dont grief !! An then he destroyed. Its very difficult to build mushrooms house.
He destroy my bed too and didnt gave me back.

Read full topic
